name: Adrian Fann
text: We had problems with soot coming out of our gas fireplace and wind and rain coming in. We purchased a fireplace insert from Atnip and it solved our problem. We were extremely pleased with the time they took to explain the many options and the computer image of how our existing mantle would look with the chosen insert. They took time to explain the remote in detail. I would definitely recommend them

resp.text: It was our pleasure to work with you. We are glad to hear you are completely satisfied. We strive to have happy customers. Please let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: John Fishman
text: If I could give a"0" star I would. DO NOT USE THIS COMPANY! We have a gas fireplace installed by Atnip at least 10 yrs ago (before we bought house). In the yrs we've been here we had them out at least once every year and it still has never worked right. Since JANUARY (!) I've been trying to schedule a service appt with them. We finally were able to schedule something today and I took the day off for it. I did miss their call - my ringer was off. But they always text and their were no texts and they said they were AT THE DOOR ready to work but no one answered it. They NEVER knocked so they were lying! Then they argued with me NOT about the lying but about my ringer being off! Typical old school Huntsville Southern business that still works as if its the '70s and there's no one else to go to. They apparently don't care about the axioms: "The customer is always right."  or "Customer comes first."  I am just ashamed I tried to work with them for so long. . AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!! We

resp.text: Our policy is to ring the doorbell and knock on the door multiple times before we proceed to call or text the homeowner. Multiple attempts were made to contact the homeowner, but we eventually had to move to the next job as contact was never made.

name: James Dint
text: Excellent service! Atnip has been around the area for as long as I can remember and I can't recommend them more. Huge showroom with lots of options to look at. I believe their installers (both named Mike if I remember correctly) were very knowledgeable and did an excellent job of installing my gas fireplace. I will continue to use them!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business! We are very blessed to have Mike and his 25+ years with us.

name: Pat Ragan
text: Just had a new gas fireplace and mantel install last week. The workman ship was great. The workers were very professional in the work they did. They were very friendly and polite. I would definitely recommend  them for your fireplace and installation needs.

resp.text: Thank you so much for your business! Hope you are still enjoying your fireplace!

name: M B
text: Mike was wonderful, very knowledgeable and a perfectionist, love our new fireplace would highly recommend atnip

resp.text: Thank you very much! We are very blessed to have Mike and for 25+ years. We hope you enjoy your new fireplace. Thank you for your business!

name: Sherry Sobul
text: Hired Atnip to fix two fireplaces. When they left they turned on.  Paid $180 for the service call. The next day when we tried to turn them on they did not turn on.   When we called we were told it was not their problem because they turned on when they left.

name: David Bland
text: Very helpful,

resp.text: Glad we could assist you.

name: Trent Martin
text: Wonderful folks that will go above and beyond to make sure you are happy!

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

name: Adrian Fann
text: We had problems with soot coming out of our gas fireplace and wind and rain coming in. We purchased a fireplace insert from Atnip and it solved our problem. We were extremely pleased with the time they took to explain the many options and the computer image of how our existing mantle would look with the chosen insert. They took time to explain the remote in detail. I would definitely recommend them

resp.text: It was our pleasure to work with you. We are glad to hear you are completely satisfied. We strive to have happy customers. Please let us know if we can help you in the future.

name: David Bland
text: Very helpful,

resp.text: Glad we could assist you.

name: Trent Martin
text: Wonderful folks that will go above and beyond to make sure you are happy!

resp.text: Thank you for your business!

name: Dana Hammele
text: I have used island granite and recommended them to my clients, too. I’m a realtor at the beach and Island Granite has worked on my own personal home and on my condo at the beach after a complete kitchen remodel. I just love them. And Dominique always takes care of me. Wish I could post some pictures. They do great work!

name: Jon Roberts
text: I think Island Granite does a wonderful job.  I have had a very positive experience for three consecutive new construction projects.  Pricing is very competitive and I have always received excellent communication from Dominique.  They do not give unrealistic deadlines.  They are busy but anytime I have had an issue they responded promptly to correct everything.  Very safe company to deal with.

name: Lori Onjukka
text: I have used island granite for 3 very large projects now in my home they have been most courteous professional timely and took a lot of time with me explaining the process and making sure I understood everything that need ed to be done for successful installation the product of course is beyond gorgeous and I am so happy thank you Aaron and thank you installers for your wonderful work!!

name: Kat Hobson
text:
I was looking for a small countertop & not having a lot of success within my budget. I stopped in here & was browsing when a young man asked if he could help. We went out in the rain (I was dressed for it, he wasn’t) to see what would work. He found something I loved, worked up my quote & made sure I had no more questions. When I placed my order with Tabitha I found that the young man was the owner of the business. Everyone who works there was professional, patient & outstanding at their job. The installation had a minor hitch that was handled immediately & well. .

I would recommend this company for any project of any size. The attention to detail, the customer service experience, the employees’ efforts to make sure everything is exactly right was great for me with my quick little remodel. I’ve found that these qualities tend to be universal when the whole company shares them. This one does.

name: Melissa Griffith
text: Wonderful company, crew was very professional  and did great work. Thank you to Tabitha for taking such good care of us.

name: Dayton Fuller
text:
THE WORST customer service experience!
Dropped in early Feb 2021 met with Tabitha
Picked out my tops and paid 1/2 up front.
1st 2 steps went smooth
1st taking my money.
2cond . Template.
Install date 3/31
After driving 5hrs one way the day before
No show No CALL I reach out to Tabitha
I was told they tried to install my tops 2 weeks
earlier and since they couldn’t because of flooring
being done at that time that she canceled my original
Install date and the new date would be 4/6/2021
After driving 5hrs again for installation this is what
I got !!!
No Show!!!!
No Call !!!

name: Mark Katz
text: Island Granite is an amazing place to work with. The people there are incredible. Always beating my expectations. I was able to work several orders with them. They come and measure for free and one week later my granite was installed. The selection is amazing and the staff couldn't be more knowledgeable or nicer. Chelsie Knows every detail about making your home, office, or second home spectacular. Call her and see her knowledge of everything stone.

resp.text: Thank you for your note. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with Island Granite. We hope you'll come and see us again soon! Thanks again for writing this awesome review.

name: Nick Neysari
text: LOUSY CUSTOMER SERVICE: I ordered quartz countertops for my kitchen and 2 bathrooms. First the installers left my home a total mess with dust outside and inside the house. Then we noticed cracks and chipped spots, I called them, they were able to repair most but not all. I have been trying to find a grid a for my kitchen sink to prevent dent and scratches so I called them for information on manufacturer and brand so I can order the correct grid, they had no information about what they sold me  and referred me to another company Triton stone group out of Loxey. I contacted Triton and they wanted the sink information and the radius of the sink. I am still waiting on Island Granite to respond. Their customer service is only good until you sign the papers.

name: Susan Cartlidge
text: Excellent work done and Erin was extremely helpful.

name: J H
text: If you are a contractor do not leave your tools alone with these people they will steal them. I have had this problem twice now. I also called to report the problem and eventually got a call from the owner. His response was if I cant prove it in court then it didnt happen. I will never use this company again nor will I ever recommend them to any of my customers

name: Gary Fillingim
text: Great selection and a wonderful, helpful staff.

name: Jacob Lee
text: Have dealt with Chelsie on several remodel projects in the past year and her and the other staff at Island Granite have not only given me great prices but have kept schedule with when and how i wanted it done. My go to granite place in Baldwin County

name: Susan Kaylor
text: Dominique is a huge help to us for selecting and planning our projects!  Always a great experience with Island Granite.

name: Johnny Beachit
text: They were very easy and pleasant to work with, and the install team was just the same!  Made our condo kitchen with the granite!

resp.text: Thanks Johnny Beachit! This review made our day!

name: Christine Bogar
text: This was the third time we have used Island Granite and they have been excellent each time. The gentlemen who installed our granite worked efficiently and knew what they were doing. The sales people were knowledgeable and friendly. The granite looks beautiful and was properly fabricated. They have a large inventory to choose from and picking out your specific slab makes a huge difference. I highly recommend Island Granite.

resp.text: This review made our day!

name: Terry Looney
text: Beautiful counter tops

name: Diane Saunders
text: Tabitha. Is. The. Best. First she helped us choose our quartz that turned out to be perfect for us. Then she even let us borrow a couple of samples just to make sure how they'd look in our home. She was always so cheerful and helpful and understanding when listening to our concerns when things didn't go quite as hoped and needed to be tweaked here and there. Tabitha is a great asset, a great people person, and definitely helped us get through this process as painlessly as possible. I just love her to pieces!!

resp.text: This review made our day!

name: Mindy Hammond
text: I have been very pleased with my experience with Island Granite.  The company has numerous choices, endless design options, and great customer service!  My contact is Chelsea and she has been a delight to work with since the moment I walked in the showroom.  From the initial phases of design and selection to the installation process, she has gone above and beyond to ensure that I am happy, satisfied, and taken care of through the entire process. Her prompt response to my calls and endless research to address my many questions have been impressive and greatly appreciated. I highly recommend both Island Granite and Chelsea for any new construction or renovation project.

resp.text: Mindy, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. Our staff will definitely be happy to read about your experience with us. So thanks for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Kimberly McCullough
text: Chelsea greeted us as soon as we walked. We told her what we were in need of and it took all of 30 minutes to pick everything out. The whole process from start to finish was very well done. Chelsea was very knowledgeable and great to work with. We have a new project coming up and will definitely be using them again.

name: Charles Malone
text: What a great experience!  To start, Dominique walked us through the process with a smile.  She managed our expectations and gave us a very good estimate.  We really liked working with her, and she was very helpful as we selected our granite, sinks, cutting style, etc...  Cody and Mario came on time and installed the granite quickly and smoothly - they were friendly too.  I was surprised by how easy the process was.

resp.text: Charles, thank you so much for taking the time to leave this excellent review.  We really appreciate your business.  Please let us know what we can do for you in the future.

name: Leigh Chappell
text: Erin was a delight to speak to, I felt like she really knew the product and was not  in a hurry to get me off the phone. She took her time and was patient with me.  Very professional and Knowledgeable. Great young lady. Really recommend this granite company over any other in the area.

resp.text: This review made our day!

name: Karen Musser
text: Chelsie has now helped me with two new residential builds for  my vacation properties.  They have a wonderful selection and Chelsie is always  a huge help in helping me select the right color. They fill your order quickly and their installers are the best. I will be using Island Granite on my new build as well. Very welcoming and first class staff. Quality Product!!

name: Joy Sullivan
text:
I can't say enough good things about Island Granite in Foley, AL. They were very professional, punctual, and neat!! They left no messes!
Chelsea in the office was such a pleasure to work with. She was patient while I was in my decision processes. My husband has his own company remodeling and she is always responsive and patient with all of his clients as well. She is amazing!!  I will post pics upon completion of my home.

resp.text: This review made our day!

name: Jill Smith
text: I am  new to the area and  needed some Information on getting  new granite in kitchen and bathrooms.  I found your company and the high rating you had.  Chelsie was the salesperson I spoke with, and what an impression she made.  She took the time to answer all of my questions,  and also explain things I would not have known. The fact that she went so above and  beyond with such kindness and knowledge. I have no doubts after speaking with her, that I chose the best company out there.  You should be so proud to have such wonderful workers, that show that they enjoy their jobs AND helping others. Way to go island granite. !!!Just wanted to share with others.

resp.text: Jill, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. Our staff will definitely be happy to read about your experience with us. So thanks for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Breanna Clemmons
text: Chelsie was absolutely delightful! She was extremely accommodating throughout the whole process. The entire sales staff was helpful and polite and the install crew was efficient. Got a great price and lovely granite in a timely manner. Definitely recommend.

resp.text: This review made our day!

name: Lilian Paiva
text: “Island granite is the best granite/quartz/marble fabricator around! The prices are amazing, the showroom is flawless & the customer service is #1! You will find exactly what you’re looking for and more! *Chelsie* is an extremely hard working sales woman & she strives to make her customers feel like family & goes above & beyond to make your dreams come true! I highly recommend island granite as your counter top installer!

resp.text: Lilian, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. Our staff will definitely be happy to read about your experience with us.

name: Rich Woodall
text: Extremely pleased with Island Granite. They did an amazing job on our bathroom and kitchen granite countertops. Chelsea was very thorough and was able to get us a great price. The installation team was on time and did an amazing job. Many thanks to the entire Island granite team!!

resp.text: This review made our day!

name: Ana Tampary
text: We had a great experience at Island Granite twice, with our kitchen and bathroom. We used white Quartz and looks amazing.  The price was great , service just outstanding. Dominique was absolutely great helping us with every detail. Knowledgeable and friendly.

resp.text: This review made our day!

name: Shane Herman
text: Our builder uses this buisness so we visited them to select products for our new home. They were friendly and accommodating. They made suggestions that we did not consider based on their experience with other builders and past customers. We had a good experience here. We can't speak on pricing of their products as this is the company our builder uses and it was built into the budget of our home. So we stayed within the choices allowed by the builder to stay on budget. Location was good they are being Covid-19 aware. Felt good working with this buisness.

name: Gay Parker
text: Island Granite is wonderful. Chelsie McCarthy is very professional and friendly. I always enjoy working with her. All the staff are great. Your installation manager is top notch also not to mention very nice looking.Overall pleasant experience. I definitely recommend Island Granite to everyone.

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. Thanks for sharing your review with us and the community.

name: Jacqueline Frisch
text: Thank you Dominique!!  You are the best!  Had it not been for you and your installation crew we would not have been able to rent our condo this next week.  You stepped up and made this happen in a matter of days even with your tight schedule. Your promptness and professionalism in handling this matter was awesome!  Thumbs up for Chelsea helping us pick out the granite.  Your installation crew are terrific.  We highly recommend this company!  We will definitely use you again.

resp.text: Hi, Ms. Jaqueline. Thank you for your note. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with Island Granite.  We hope you'll come and see us again soon! Thanks again for writing this awesome review.

name: Casey Gilmore
text: Island granite is the best around! The prices are unbelievable & the service is exceptional! Chelsie is pretty much the most amazing saleswoman I have ever met in any field. She knows her stuff & is passionate about it!

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. Thanks for sharing your review with us and the community.

name: Charlotte Black
text:
Chelsir at Island Granite is THE BEST! I didn’t know anything about bathroom remodeling when I walked through the door. Thanks to Chelsie who went through every moment of picking out my vanity top with me, I feel like I have the very best and most beautiful vanity in Baldwin county! Every business should be so lucky as to have an employee like Chelsie.
The store is just beautiful with a plethora of products! Anything you could want to chose from. They give you coffee, drinks and sweeties for your shopping pleasure! A great great experience!!! Thanks guys!

name: Becky Demetropolis
text: Tabitha was great to work with. Most helpful throughout the entire process. There was a “glitch” in communication between us as to the type of finished edge on our countertop. But after it was called to her attention, she quickly adjusted my remaining balance to compensate me for the error!  I was extremely happy with that. Overall, I would recommend Island  Granite. Installation guys were great, too.

resp.text: Beacky, thank you so much for this review. We're really glad to ear about your experience with us. Hope see you soon for a new project!!

name: Chad Aumueller
text: Top quality company that offers a great product and competitive pricing.  Our sale rep Chelsie was amazing to work with and even helped us alter the shape of our kitchen counters without having to install new cabinet bases.  Response time was quick and installation was prompt.  Will be using them again in the future!  Thanks for the help Chelsie!

name: US Citizen
text: The job they did for me was terrible. The work was so bad it would not have lasted anytime. Tile was even falling off. Another company came in and fixed it. They were appalled at the quality of work. I asked for some type of remuneration for the repairs. They would do nothing. Don’t stand behind their business or work.

resp.text:
Mr. White,
I am really sorry to hear that you are not happy with your project. I wish we had the opportunity to make this right for you. Our tile manager did reach out to you on March 10, 2020 via email, to see if you would like us replace the shower at no cost to you. Customer satisfaction is our number one priority and I apologize we could not deliver the service we hold at a high regard.

name: Joseph Russell
text: Island Granite is a wonderful company and we never use anyone else. Chelsie is great, she goes out of her way to help us with anything and everything! I would highly recommend working them and ask for Chelsie.

resp.text: Joseph, Thank you so much for this great 5-star review.  We really appreciate you being a loyal customer and helping to share the word about us.  We’re here for you anytime.

name: Diane M. Variali
text: So far I've had a good experience with this company and sales person Chelsie McCarthy.  Good and fair pricing and very helpful and accommodating!  And a good selection of natural stones. It's worth a visit to them!

resp.text: Diane, thank you so much for taking the time to leave this excellent review.  We really appreciate your business.  Please let us know what we can do for you in the future.

name: Melissa White
text: We had a terrific experience at Island Granite! We did not have a lot of time as we were only in town for a couple of days. From the moment we walked in the door, the staff was professional and knowledgable. Tabitha gave us a crash course in granite and helped us find the best price/fit for our needs, working hard to track down our  granite.  She ended up saving us a lot of money and we will definitely use Tabitha and Island Granite again for future projects!

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. Thanks for sharing your review with us and the community.

name: Kerry Florence
text:
We have used Island Granite 3 different times . They have a good selection at
competitive prices.We always ask for Chelsie to help us. She will walk the yard with you until you
find what you want. She’s friendly, knowledgeable,and always has time for us.Whatever you
Are paying her, it’s not enough......Kerry and Sharon Florence, Admirals Quarters 307.

name: Barbara Teem
text: Thank you very very much Dominique. It was our pleasure dealing and working with you. You were very nice and kind to us as well. I appreciate you for being so nice! You’re the best!!!

resp.text: We’re so glad you had a good experience.

name: Lilo, Legend
text: Great service great customer service. Very pleased with my new counters 🤩

name: Renae Austin
text: Bought granite for two bathrooms from Island Granite. I dealt with Chelsie and found her to be very helpful and accommodating. She made the experience stress free! I am very happy with the workmanship as well!!

resp.text: This review made our day!

name: Jeremy Landry
text: Great experience getting our granite installed in a house we are remodeling! Chelsie in the office was great to work with in getting our granite selected and scheduled quickly and without any issues.  The guys that installed the granite ware quick efficient and very polite.  Will definitely news Island Granite for future projects!

resp.text: Hi Jeremy, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. Our staff will definitely be happy to read about your experience with us! We're glad that you enjoyed your experience with us and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Purdy Thangz Boutique
text: We absolutely love the service that we have received from Chelsea!!  She if super efficient, gives us a great product and timeline and takes all of the stress and worry out of shopping here!  I absolutely use these guys anytime we have a need!  Thank You Chelsea for all that you do!!

resp.text: We’re so glad you had a good experience.

name: Steven Howell
text: Great experience. Dominique was very helpful from beginning to end. She is awesome to work with. The installers did a wonderful job. Counter tops look great.

resp.text: Steven, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. Our staff will definitely be happy to read about your experience with us.

name: Pietro De Melo Mota
text: Great deals and everything

name: Fabiana Dias
text: They did a really good job at my house. They have a good price and great staff. If you’re planning to put granite in your house go to the island granite and talk to Dominique Siqueira. She’s awesome!! We really appreciate all she did for us.

resp.text: Thank you for the awesome review. We greatly appreciate it.

name: judy mellichamp
text: As a designer, it is great to work with a company that has excellent service and great prices.  I have had the pleasure of working with Chelsea for over a year now and she is always responsive, able to deliver excellent customer service to myself and our customers.   A+++

resp.text: We’re so glad you had a good experience.

name: LM “Lm Cleaning Services” Services
text: From a business owner, this company was amazing to work with. All questions and concerns we had were answered quickly by Tabitha, and all our work done turned out beautiful! Thank you Island Granite!

name: Stephanie Cain
text: Chelsie was a dream to work with on two separate occasions! She’s the reason I came back to the island granite the second time! Their prices are really great also!

name: Austin Smith
text: We recently just leased a house with an option to buy and are in the process of gathering quotes to remodel in the hopes we actually buy the house. We contacted several granite companies in the area and one company stood out among all others which was Island Granite. Our contact was a lady named Chelsie. And even though we explained to her that we were just in the process of getting quotes and it may be a year out before we would actually make a decision on our project, she treated us as if we were a lifelong customer or a family member of hers. We were very impressed by the entire experience given by her. She was knowledgeable and very helpful! If we decide to buy and remodel our home we will defiantly use Island Granite… Thanks again Chelsie for ALL of your HELP!

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. Thanks for sharing your review with us and the community.

name: travis gomez
text: Great customer service and really good prices! Chelsea has been out of this world helping us at every step possible! Anything you need related to granite, give this company a call and ask for Chelsea. All of your granite needs will be met.

name: Neal Dawson
text: I always use Island granite for all of my projects and personal jobs, from the Salesforce very helpful and knowledgeable Dominique always takes care of what we need on our job site.. the guys that do the installation very professional and do great jobs. When someone ask me about Granite tops I always tell them to use Island granite. I look forward to working with Alan granite in the future on other projects.

resp.text: Thank you for your note. We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with Island Granite. We hope you'll come and see us again soon! Thanks again for writing this awesome review.

name: Jill Kinard
text: I had a great experience with Island Granite. Chelsea was my salesperson and was wonderful helping me with my bathroom remodel. All the girls and staff were very friendly and helpful.

name: Patricia Williams
text: Thank you Chelsie and Island granite for making our condo so amazingly beautiful. Great prices, great service along with a huge selection. It was so much fun working with you all.

resp.text: This review made our day!

name: Chris Sisson
text: Tabitha was super helpful with my entire project, she has a lot of knowledge and made me a great deal! She even helped me save money on my tile project as well. The store has a great selection and does beautiful work.

resp.text: So thanks for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Santana Wilson
text: I recommend Island Granite. Great company and a pleasure to work with over the phone. Chelsie was professional and answered all my questions. (And I had MANY) When I chose to replace my countertops I will definitely be using this company.

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. Thanks for sharing your review with us and the community.

name: Derek Welch
text: Working with Chelsie has been a pleasure. Island Granite is a great fabricator in our local area. I highly recommend you have them come out and give you an estimate on countertops and other new home and remodel ideas.

resp.text: Derek, hanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. Our staff will definitely be happy to read about your experience with us. So thanks for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Ray Hicks
text: My wife and I recently purchased a condo in Orange Beach and had a short window of time to replace all countertops. It was a pleasure working with Chelsie who is very knowledgeable and helpful to fulfill our needs. We were only here for 10 Days yet Chelsie and her staff were able to complete the install in that time frame. I highly recommend them.

resp.text: Ray Hicks, thank you so much for this review. We're really glad to ear about your experience with us. Hope see you soon for a new project!!

name: Kyle & Kristin
text: Our vacation home was due for a counter upgrade. So we called a few area companies to receive quotes. Island Granite responded quickly and was willing to work with our schedule. We were not pressured or hounded by extra sale calls - as it sometimes takes us time to make a decision. Once we decided to use Island Granite the process could not have gone any smoother. We were so pleased from the original estimate to getting all our questions answered throughout the install. And Chelsie was a gem in the office. We were not completely certain on what color schemes to utilize and we found Chelsie's guidance to be beyond our expectations. We are more than satisfied with our choices and would highly recommend Island Granite for your future renovations.

resp.text: Kristin, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. Our staff will definitely be happy to read about your experience with us.

name: Chris Shaw
text: Tabitha & the entire Island Granite Team are great to work with! This is our second condo that we used Island Granite to replace the kitchen countertop, and we could. It be happier :) Their pricing is great! And their people are even better!

name: Joe S
text: Chelsie has always provide exceptional service every time I contacted Island Granite. Their countertop installations are done in a timely manner of top tier quality. I’ll be using this company again and recommend others to do so.

name: Linda Shofner
text:
We recently had Corian countertops installed in our home and our condo.  We cannot express how helpful and knowledgeable Tabitha was during our experience.  She answered our many questions and went above and beyond.  I would certainly recommend Tabitha to anyone interested in your company.  Amazingly personable and I know you realize she is an asset to your business.

Thanks!

name: Nevin Maria
text: Chelsie was very helpful with us picking out our countertops.  She was super sweet and very knowledgeable! Thanks for all your help !

resp.text: Neavin Maria, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. Our staff will definitely be happy to read about your experience with us. So thanks for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Christy Daniel
text: I loved Island Granite from the minute I walked on the lot.  I was greeted by Chelsie and she was friendly and very knowledgeable.  Additionally, I liked working with the same individual  from start to finish  She scheduled my install and they were punctual, polite and awesome.  She followed up afterwards to confirm everything was done to my satisfaction which it was.  Then, she squeezed me into the schedule to have my cooktop installed since it's wasn't here when they did the initial install.  And, yes she followed up with me again.  I highly recommend Island Granite and Chelsie McCarthy.

resp.text: Christy Daniel, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. Our staff will definitely be happy to read about your experience with us. So thanks for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Amber Andrews
text: Glad to have worked with island granite and their crew! Would highly recommend! Tabitha was the cherry on top with her excellent customer service!

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. Thanks for sharing your review with us and the community.

name: Chandy Mcdonald
text:
I can’t say enough kind words to express how wonderful it was to deal with Island Granite!
Chelsie was my sales person. She was very knowledgeable about every detail of my project.
She always answered my questions and helped me make decisions on things I hadn’t even thought of to complete my countertops. She always respond in a timely manner and patiently answered any questions I had. Which were a lot! Chelsie made the whole process smooth and enjoyable! I give Island Granite 5 stars! - Chandy McDonald

name: Rick Muckey
text: Tabitha and the staff are amazing to work with! I build several homes and there attention to my needs are second to none! I would highly recommend them to everyone.

resp.text: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this amazing review.

name: Donna Willis
text: I had the pleasure of using Lane as my sales rep. She was very knowledgeable and professional. The prices were great. I own a property management company and I will use Island Granite again for my owner's granite needs.

resp.text: Dear Donna Willis, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. Our staff will definitely be happy to read about your experience with us. So thanks for your kind words and we look forward to seeing you again.

name: Kim Cobern
text: I have worked with Island Granite on several projects and have always enjoyed working with Chelsea! She is always helpful and professional which makes a large project much more enjoyable.

name: Edie Krisa
text: Chelsie made our experience so easy replacing countertops in our house on West Beach.  We described to her what we envisioned for the replacement, and she found us the perfect product, then scheduled and directed us through the entire process with the additional people we needed for plumbing, etc.  Everything happened exactly as it should have, and we have been completely thrilled with our new countertops.  Everyone involved in the process was easy to work with and made it a positive experience.

resp.text: Edie, thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. Our staff will definitely be happy to read about your experience with us.

name: Robert Pearson
text: I was uncertain about countertops and how to shop for just the right material and just the right color. Then I  stopped  at Island Granite and had the good luck to meet Chelsie. I explained  to her my inability to select the proper  colors, design etc. With her experience  and guidance  she was able to walk me through  the process and pick out the best matches. If it had not been for her I  would  have probably  ended up at lowes or home depot and probably would have had a horrible experience  and an empty wallet. THANKS Chelsie

name: Candis Busby
text: Tabitha was great to work with! She was knowledgeable and offered suggestions that would provide solutions for our projects.

resp.text: Candis, thank you so much for this review. We're really glad to ear about your experience with us. Hope see you soon for a new project!!

name: Terry Looney
text: Erin was a pleasure to talk to on the phone. Very knowledgeable about the granite. I would definitely recommend Island Granite.

name: Pietro FN
text: It is amazing

text: I recommend Island Granite. Tabitha was very helpful and knowledgeable about the product. excellent customer service.

name: Eric Starace
text: Excellent service!

name: Barbara Zemke
text: The installers did an awesome job. All of plumbing work was completed timely and looked beautiful.  Thanks guys.

resp.text: Hi, Ms. Barbara. We're extremely happy with your review! We work hard to meet expectations like yours, and we’re happy to hear we hit the mark for you. Come back and see us soon. Thanks!

name: Lakin Kirkley
text: Tabitha was very helpful and knowledgeable about the product. Very professional young lady. Her customer service was amazing.

resp.text: Thanks for leaving us such a wonderful review. Our staff will definitely be happy to read about your experience with us.

name: cap tek
text: Island Granite helped transform our concept for a home into a reality.  They installed quartz countertops in the kitchen, both bathrooms and around the fireplace.  We opted for Gioia Carrara which can be tricky to work with at times, but they mastered the project with ease.  The crew for our house was Airton and Peu.  If you are building a house and want it done right, then just opt for the best and request those two gentlemen.  I could write a long review, but it comes down to three words: professionalism, quality craftsmanship and customer service.  That was our experience with Island Granite.

resp.text: Cap Tek, we're so happy that your project just turns out the way that you want. Hoping to work with you soon again.

name: Kate Porter
text: Chelsie was awesome to work with! She took care of everything and made the process seamless.

name: Catherine Wilhelm
text: This is a must use company! Tabitha is who you want to complete your experience. We love her!

name: Kerry Rhodes
text: Island granite is a great place to get all your granite and they have the best and knowledgeable person in Tabitha working for them , couldn’t have a better experience with anyone else. Thanks.

resp.text: We are so grateful for your kind words. Thanks for sharing your review with us and the community.

name: Jacob Knighton (J)
text: Tabitha was great!

name: lOUIS STRONG
text: Sharing my experience with Clark Memorials.  Our salesman was terrific. He was older.  He told me from the start that it was going to take some time because of Covid. It took about 13 weeks to get my mother's head stone and was worth the wait!  My family and I are very pleased.  Thank You Clark Memorials!!

resp.text: Thank you for the 5 star review!

name: Marie
text: I wouldn't recommend this company at all. They don't care about the customers and the grief we are going through. I called four times before I finally talked to someone about adding the death date for my mom and they said I would be notified when it was completed...never notified. If I hadn't went to the cemetery I wouldn't have know it was completed. That's horrible for a business to lie and rather heartless knowing a loved one is waiting on an update about the completion of something that's important for a lost loved one and you've paid for it too. Unacceptable.

resp.text:
Hello, I hated to read the review you wrote about Clark Memorials. We strive very hard to treat each customer as if they were family. We did not notify you because during the time the engraving was done, our offices were closed because of Covid 19.
Our offices closed 2 days after you placed your order.  We were closed for about 45 days.
Our sandblaster took it upon himself to add the date to your mother's headstone since that was something he could in the cemetery during the time our offices were closed even though he was not required to do so until we reopened. Upon re-opening, we learned that 3 date of passing had been added to monuments.  Again, I am very sorry you feel the way you do.

name: TW Hutchens
text: My experience with Clark Memorials was excellent!!!  From start to finish!!!

name: L Watters
text:
Why can’t I give no stars!
Never again will I use this company. I’d rather learn to make my own marker than use them. They have the type of bad customer service that has you ordering from Walmart and Amazon instead of supporting local businesses.

name: Lucretia Sumerel
text: Friendly owner really helpful. Not pushy at all.

name: Melinda McWaters
text:
Done a Beautiful job on my Parents head stone just Beautiful it’s at least 10 Stars ⭐️!!!
Thanks so much Mr. Chase.

name: Meghan
text: Family owned and great people. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone.

name: LaKisha knight
text: Words cannot express how disappointed I am. I was reassured several times over several months that my mother’s headstone would be delivered and placed before Mother’s Day. Even up to 3 days before, they lied and told me they were placing the headstone down. Needless to say, it didn’t happen. I was saddened that I wouldn’t get the closure of giving my mother her “last” gift for Mother’s Day. And all Clark Memorials said was “we’re sorry”. Unprofessional and unacceptable!!

name: Barbara Stephens
text: Courteous, responsible,  compassionate, good communication, excellent work.

name: Gina Huie
text: Well established business here in Birmingham. Pleasant employees and very knowledgeable.

name: . Harris
text: The place to go. They will take care of you and handle the situation. That's why they have been in business for over 60 yrs...

name: Angela Regulus
text: Don't be in a hurry for service. Order a year in advance

name: Cohen Palmer
text: Usually fast and easy.

name: Ann Legg
text:
Your people were very helpful.
They even used the fork lift to get more product down for us.

name: Steve Russell
text: The crew here goes out of their way to help me and my business.

name: rod rosser
text: Sam helps everyone. Great employee. Deresa ( misspelled maybe) is also a great Smiling helper.

name: David Cunningham
text: They quickly located the tool I needed online and guided me right to it. Thank you.

name: Joseph Woodham
text: A good visit,  employees very helpful with selection of product.

name: Bill Tiemann
text: The pro desk was very helpful in locating product and very friendly.

name: Laroy Kirkland
text: Great people......cece is fantastic service pro

name: Sunny Chung
text: Absolutely LOVE my new countertop installed by Alabama Stoneworks. Cody and his associate came and installed it quickly and beautifully. Didn’t damage a single thing in my kitchen and was extremely respectful. Gave me good ideas of how to grout the gap left between the new countertop and the existing wall tile because i opted not to have them put the silicone caulk. I highly recommend this company. From the moment I contacted them to final installation it was smooth. There was one small issue with the faucet hose being pinched by the sink but they came right out and fixed it immediately.

name: Tint Pro
text: Glenda and David run an absolute top notch company! From the first phone call to the final wipe down they executed the best customer service. The entire team did a great job measuring, cutting, installing, and we absolutely love our new counters. I highly recommend this business!

name: Cherie Fancher
text:
Awesome people! Clear communication all the way
Everyone was courteous from sale to installation. Quality materials and service. The countertop looks great

name: John Gill
text: Super easy to work with, Glenda goes above and beyond to get your stone selection and details of fabrication the way you want. When the stone I wanted was out of stock with the local wholesalers, she tracked it down in New Orleans. When I came back with some extra pieces to make after the kitchen was in, they were immediately on top of it, I didn’t feel like I went to the back of the queue. Price was very competitive

name: palmer3acr
text: My wife and I used ASW for our countertops in our old home a few years ago. Great work at fair prices. Recently our auto repair shop (Green Garage) needed a flat surface to resurface a cylinder head from a vintage BMW we didn't trust giving to anyone else. ASW generously gave us a piece of scrap stone and even helped me load it in my car. They refused payment and only wanted referrals in return. Great people all the way around. Use them! Thank y'all again!

name: Steve Baccus
text: These are terrific folks. We went with the granite they suggested would go well with our cherry kitchen cabinetry and it is perfect! There was only a one week turnaround from when they removed the old counter tops, to the measuring of the template and then installation. There was a problem around the sink after installation, but I contacted them and they came back out the same day of installation and fixed it. All around great experience. My wife is very happy, so I am happy!

name: LaRinda Green
text: Glenda was wonderful from start to finish.   Due to covid, they were only seeing people by appointment but on the day I called she told me if I had measurements, she could email me a quote.  From that day, to the install on today,  it was a smooth process.  The installers were great at answering any questions I had and were so polite to the whole family.  Thank you ASW,  I am so happy.

name: R. Cherri Pitts
text: As an architect and builder, I’ve worked on many projects with them  from basic countertops to highly custom projects. They are are my go to crew. We just finished a project that they fabricated a floating marble sink with a sliver of a slot drain that makes everyone stop in their tracks to study it-even the building inspector!!! They are great people, and I highly recommend them!

name: Alden Harrison
text: Very friendly and helpful

name: Corinne Giles
text: Called to see if they had any Cynclips to use on my dropped kitchen sink and the man said they didn't use those, rather they drilled holes on the backside of the Granite when cutting.  (Which is the right way to do it, I have read.). He then gave me a several suggestions on how to fix the problem without buying the clips.  I was so appreciative since my husband is trying to tackle the issue instead of paying for someone to do it.  I will be contacting Surface One in the future to install bathroom countertops.

resp.text: Thank you, Corinne Giles! We appreciate that you took the time to post this review and we look forward to working with you on those bathroom tops. S1

name: Alicia Hale
text: Totally Satisfied!  Surface One in Pelham installed quartz countertops for us and we are so happy with the finished product.  Ryan helped us pick out the perfect countertops based on what we were looking for.  They were professional from the time we shopped until everything was done.  We went to several places for quotes and Surface One was cheaper than the others.

name: Melissa
text: Nice on phone but if you don't have a big project then don't bother. Drive 45 min for them not to help and not care.

name: Stuart Nicholson
text: We are very happy with the service and the counters that we received from Surface One. Everyone we dealt with was very happy and they went out of their way to get the material we preferred. Bruce, Tebra, Cheryl, and Mary Margaret answered any questions we had and made sure we got what we wanted. Brent, who measured the kitchen, was very knowledgeable and explained the whole fabrication and installation process. Thank you to everyone!

name: Dawn Calvert
text: Great selection of material to choose from.  Great customer service!

resp.text: Thank you, Dawn. We appreciate your review and your business!

name: Kevin McPherson
text: These guys are the best I have seen in the Birmingham area!  Otstanding customer service, great products, quality installations from a top notch, very professional solid surface company!!

name: Larry Wyatt
text: We stopped in to get prices for a kitchen counter top remodel. Sales person not very knowledgeable and did not offer us a price while we were there. Told us she would email quote "within the hour" well it has been almost 2 weeks, and no quote. If you can not provide pricing when promised I sure will not trust you to provide materials. We will not be purchasing here

name: james
text: Awesome selection of granite and solid surface and very friendly and knowledgeable staff. Very experienced fabricators and installers.

name: Liz Burton
text:
This company was subcontracted by my kitchen remodel company to provide granite countertops.  First issue is that they will not come measure 'after hours' so we had to take off work to be available.  The job required 4 pieces of granite, one to be joined.  Again we were asked to take off work to come view the work particularly the joint.  They had equipment in front of one of the pieces, so we missed the fact that this piece was too short on the end.  The sealer from counter to cabinet even showed.
We complained thru the contractor and Surface One gave them a heard time about  replacing it.  After weeks of waiting they sent two workers out and again the piece was too short.  After that, they finally sent someone out to measure again.  A third piece was sent out after 9 or so weeks and this piece finally fit.  Not only were we put out because of lost of time in the kitchen, but the installer with the third piece was the original installer and he told us he told the Source One owner that he knew we would not be happy with the first piece.  So this is the kind of shoddy work they try to get away with.  Not to mention the lack of cooperation with my contractor to work out the issue.  I would not recommend them.

name: Brenda Lynn
text: Great customer service. Very professional.

name: David Hunt
text: Good job!
